Reviews.Title: Poor quality of range longer than 20 feet
Reviews.Author: Gerald M. Deslauriers "dog lover"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item and initially installed the camera and receiver only 15 feet apart in separate rooms. The reception quality was fair to good. Then I moved the receiver to another TV about 20 feet away separated by brick and wallboard. The reception is very very poor! I would advise spending a little more and purchasing a unit with better long range reception. Also the way the camera is mounted it does not adjust to angle changes very good.

Reviews.Title: Decent product
Reviews.Author: Adam Wood
Reviews.Content: This product is decent for the price.is has  a short range of 100 feet and you have to tune in the camera manuallybut all in all if you need a cheap wireless camera to go from room to room it will work

Reviews.Title: NOT A GOOD CHOICE
Reviews.Author: jesuisfemme1
Reviews.Content: VIDEO & sound QUALITY is very poor close range and long range. I've had it for less than a year and it doesn't work any longer. Actually after the 4 month mark of having it, it pooped out completely.

Reviews.Title: Not High Definition, but it's ok
Reviews.Author: Luis Chang
Reviews.Content: The image is fine to make some test, the mic capture more noise from enviroment than the conversation you need.But it's what you get for a few bucks.This kit it's only for fun, not for a serious recording.

Reviews.Title: Fair wireless range
Reviews.Author: Michael Pigg "The other Mike Pigg"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a good camera, however the range of 150 feet is greatly exaggerated. I hardly made it past 50 feet before I started to lose the signal. You definitely get what you pay for, that is one reason I gave it a three star rating. Had it been more pricey, I would have shipped it back and given it at most one star.

Reviews.Title: Micro 2.4 GHz Wireless Camera
Reviews.Author: John A. Hudick
Reviews.Content: The unit arrived missing the wireless camera.  I have the electronic experience to make an antenna.When I tested this unit I found the video to be such low quality it was useless. The receiver tuning was touchy, much like tuning a regenerative receiver (1940's technology)  This unit is a POS and I returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Camera for a robot, worked ok
Reviews.Author: Eltopia
Reviews.Content: I got this for a robotics class, the range in a wide open space was 200-300 feet and indoors was about 50 (thick masonry and steel cabinets ). it required re-tuning often as our project moved around. It seams to be very susceptible to interference from other 2.5 Ghz band items, our controllers would make a horizontal band in the video and WiFi signals some times dropped out when this was operating. Signal was often very poor with a low battery (it will drain a 9 volt quickly) and would sometimes require re-tuning after replacing the battery(worked fine plugged in with power supply it came with). It worked for what we needed and for the price it was the right item.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R. Rajca
Reviews.Content: You probably will not find another set-up for this price that works this good. I have used these for security cameras. The picture is almost as good as my $125 cameras (which do not have a wireless sending unit). The box that comes with this camera can pick up other wireless cameras if you use the dial on the end of it. They work non-stop in freezing weather. I leave them on 24/7 and it will typically last longer than 2 years.

Reviews.Title: on time delivery
Reviews.Author: Thomas Workmaster
Reviews.Content: it work good in little place that you can not get a big camera in thank you for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Works like I thought it would.  Bought this the other day, just got it yesterday, haven't used it to it's full extent yet.

Reviews.Title: Suffice normal product.
Reviews.Author: kaxa
Reviews.Content: Enough to a normal product. I am satisfied with the product. And I do not regret that he had bought. Especially pleased with the delivery system. They sent very quickly and efficiently. Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full Motion Real Time Full Color Video With No Delay & Super Clear Quality 380-lines Resolution
150ft Range , 2.450 GHz Output Frequency , Adjusting Knob On Receiver To Fine Tune Picture Quality
Built-in Microphone For Clear Sound , Receiver Is Wall-Mountable Or Can Be Placed On Any flat Surface
Camera Runs On 9-volt Battery or AC Adapter
Composite Video Connections On Receiver
ProductInfo.Name: Micro 2.4GHz Wireless Security Camera / Closed Circuit TV (CCTV) / Babysitter Surveillance System / Children Watch / With Sound Microphone & Micro Mini Color Camera / 150 Foot Range
